articles.title: Melbourne returns to lockdown as Australia scrambles to curb outbreak - New Straits Times
articles.description: MELBOURNE: Melbourne’s streets returned to the eerie quiet of lockdown for the fifth time Friday, as Australia battled to contain an outbreak of the Delta variant of Covid-19 in its two largest cities.
